content: संघट्टः {@--1@} Friction, rubbing together; सरलस्कंधसंघट्टजन्मा (दवाग्नः) <ls>Me. 53</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 3</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">9. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Collision, clashing together, encounter; <ls>Śi. 20. 26.</ls> {@--3@} Encounter, conflict. {@--4@} Meeting, joining, collision or rivalry (as of wives); <ls>R. 14. 86.</ls> {@--5@} Embracing. --ट्टा A large creeper.
